nodes.text: The Jal-paara G-62 Repulsorsail Skiff was an aquatic vehicle widely used in Lamaredd c. 29 BBY. It combined obsolete repulsorsail technology with mounted pontoons because it was cheaper than finding a real repulsorlift unit.
There were several available sizes and some of them, such as MD-0C6's unit, were customized, sometimes even armed.
